segments.text: I see two children involved in some secretive activity on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched upwards, one hand already in a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the label 'COOKIE JAR' and it's full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His younger companion, a girl, stands nearby, reaching out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly anticipating her share of the stolen cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so wobbly; I fear it will tip backward any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be a nasty tumble, maybe even broken dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating that the adult is completely oblivious to this risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These children are quite bold to attempt such a feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are taking a serious chance for a few sweet treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt from this dangerous adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
